entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
